item.title: Predict the diamond price based on the 4 c's
item.description: Preamble: This document focuses on the analysis of the diamonds data frame. Descriotion of data frame diamonds can be found at https://stat.ethz.ch/R-manual/R-devel/library/datasets/html/diamonds.html Research questions: am i getting a fair deal when I purchase a diamond? The goal is to build a predictive model for diamonds, that is going to help figure out whether a given diamond is a good deal or a rip-off! Structure of analysis: I will use Linear Regression to predict the diamond price using other varaibles in the diamonds dataframe.

item.title: Machine Learning using linear regression to predict house prices
item.description: Intro & Background Linear regression being one of the most basic and popular algorithms in machine learning, so when aspiring data scientist starts off in this field, linear regression is inevitably the first algorithm they come across. Analysis Approach You can click on the link below to see the working code in Python and reproduce it to test the strength of your own password. https://github.com/2series/100_Days_of_ML_Code/blob/master/Linear_Regression_from_Scratch.ipynb
